medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset abdominal pain in the right lower quadrant (RLQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient awoke at 5 AM with severe RLQ abdominal pain. The pain persisted and became dull over the course of the day.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Pre-diabetes 2. Hypertension 3. Dyslipidemia 4. GERD 5. Hiatal Hernia 6. Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia status post prostatectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had coronary artery disease (CAD) and coronary artery bypass grafting (CABG).
